lyrics:
"Young Niggas" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Young Niggas" (with Waka Flocka Flame) [Chorus: Gucci] My pants saggin low like a young nigga I'm twistin up the drough like a young nigga I am in the club thirty deep like a young nigga I'm still in the streets like a young nigga Like a young nigga this one is for the young niggas Where ya from nigga this ones for the young niggas [repeat] [Verse: Gucci] Yeah most my niggas rob they ain't gotta job I got a couple young niggas that'll take the charge So I don't bring a bodyguard I bring my entourage Stop the track pause... R.I.P. to Camoflouge I am about to pull my yellow 'rarri out the car garage I got some young niggas that'll hide your body parts [Verse: Flocka] Twistin fingers in the club I'm a young nigga Got them old niggas sayin I love that young nigga Your whole click buyin shots y'all some broke niggas Pants saggin, flag hangin I'm a young nigga In the car strapped up with them guns nigga We shootin at the police just for fun nigga [Chorus: Gucci] Yeah most my niggas rob they ain't gotta job I got a couple young niggas that'll take the charge So I don't bring a bodyguard I bring my entourage Stop the track pause... R.I.P. to Camoflouge I am about to pull my yellow 'rarri out the car garage I got some young niggas that'll hide your body parts [Verse: Flocka] Ray Charles vision screamin wheres the competetion? Lot of rappers on the corner man they swag missing I'm on that young nigga shit, shiesty ass niggas at my shows run for bricks Gucci said I'm going hard Flocka on this shit Old school swag got these hoes on my dick I'm allowed to pick I'm like which girl to get? Pulled up on some onset yellow and black whip I'm on my Wiz Khalifa shit, I don't do no papers Fresh up on them papers, haters catch the vapours Shoes alligator I'm talkin about Jordans She ain't got enough swag shawtay can't afford em' [Chorus: Gucci] My pants saggin low like a young nigga I'm twistin up the drough like a young nigga I am in the club thirty deep like a young nigga I'm still in the streets like a young nigga This one is for the young niggers Where ya from nigga this ones for the young niggas [repeat] if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) { document.getElementById('azmxmbanner').style.display='block'; document.write('
'+ ''+ '
'); } Submit Corrections Thanks to Mking for correcting these lyrics. Writer(s): Juaquin Malphurs, Radric Davis, Joshua "southside" Luellen AZLyrics G Gucci Mane Lyrics album: "Ferrari Boyz" (2011) Ferrari Boyz 15th And The 1st Break Her Feed Me Mud Musik In My Business Young Niggas Suicide Homicide PacMan Stoned She Be Puttin' On So Many Things Too Loyal Search
title: Young Niggas Lyrics | AZLyrics.com
